itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, August 19, 2013
teaser: As violence escalates and criticism grows of Egypt's military-backed regime, European aid to Egypt is now under greater scrutiny.
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

As violence escalates and criticism grows of Egypt's military-backed regime, American and European aid to Egypt is now under greater scrutiny. Marketplace's Stephen Beard joins Morning Report host Mark Garrison to discuss.

","type":"text/html"}]
description: As violence escalates and criticism grows of Egypt's military-backed regime, European aid to Egypt is now under greater scrutiny.
contentencoded: As violence escalates and criticism grows of Egypt's military-backed regime, American and European aid to Egypt is now under greater scrutiny. Marketplace's Stephen Beard joins Morning Report host Mark Garrison to discuss.
title: EU questions aid to Egypt as violence rages
